series_description: This series documents the annual audits conducted by Public Accountants for domestic insurers. This series may include, but is not limited to, audited annual financial and reports

series_title: Annual Audited Financial Statements: Foreign and Alien
series_description: This series documents the annual audits conducted by Public Accountants for foreign and alien insurers. This series may include, but is not limited to, audited annual financial statements and reports
This series documents the annual financial statements by regulated domestic insurers. This series may include, but is not limited to, annual financial statements

series_title: Annual Financial Statements: Foreign and Alien
series_description: This series documents the annual financial statements by regulated foreign and alien insurers. This series may but is not limited to, annual financial statements

This series documents the ongoing review of regulated companies in accordance with Commission authority. This series may include, but is not limited to: Bureau analysis of companies, internal controls reports, correspondence, and required follow-up documents
retention_statement: 6 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents inquiries about practices of insurers other entities. This series may include, but is not limited to, investigation files of unlicensed activity in Virginia and any corresponding resolutions

series_title: Closed, Denied, or Withdrawn License Applications
series_description: This series documents the receipt and closure, denial, or withdrawal of an application to operate as an insurer in This series may include, but is not limited to, license applications

This series documents the historic documentation necessary regulate domestic insurers conducting business in the Commonwealth. This series may include, but is not limited to: affiliated contracts, holding company registration statements, financial projections, plan of operation, questionnaires, applications, application approvals and supporting documents, and correspondence

This series documents the historic documentation necessary regulate foreign insurers conducting business in the Commonwealth. This series may include, but is not limited to: affiliated contracts, holding company registration statements, financial projections, plan of operation, questionnaires, applications, application approvals and supporting documents, and correspondence.

series_title: Continuing Care Retirement Communities: Disclosure Statements
series_description: This series documents the filing of a disclosure statement by retirement communities. This series may include, but is not limited to, documents required to register a Continuing Care Retirement Community (CCRC) and the annual disclosure statements required to be filed by each CCRC
retention_statement: 10 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the performance on examinations on financial condition of domestic and certain foreign insurance companies. This series may include, but is not limited to: examiners' notes, calculations, findings, recommendations, copies of source documents

series_title: Group Self Insurance Associations (GSIA): Indemnity Agreements
series_description: This series documents the receipt of indemnity agreements from Group Self-Insurance Associations (GSIA) and their acceptance by the commission. This series may include, but is not limited to, indemnity agreements from GSIA, correspondence, and supporting documents

This series documents the receipt by the Commission of required by holding companies. This series may include, but is not limited to: documents required for registration of holding companies, documents required for termination of registration, enterprise risk reports, group capital calculation reports, and other information required to be filed
retention_statement: 10 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Managed Care Health Insurance Plan (MCHIP) Filings
series_description: This series documents receipt of filings made by Managed Health Insurance Plans (MCHIP). This series may include, but is not limited to, MCHIP applications and supporting
This series documents the filing of quarterly financial by insurers. This series may include, but is not limited to, financial statements
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the examination of domestic insurers' financial condition. This series may include, but is not limited reports

series_title: Reports of Examinations: Foreign and Alien
series_description: This series documents the examination of foreign and alien insurers' financial condition. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports
This series documents the Commission's receipt of Risk Capital reports (a standard measure of solvency) required of insurers. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Schedule of Securities on Deposit with State Treasurer
series_description: This series documents the market value of financial securities deposited with the State Treasurer by insurers. This series include, but is not limited to, schedule of securities
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents that required legal reserves are maintained by licensed domestic insurers. This series may include, but is not limited to, valuations
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of state fiscal year
